About

Development

Education:
Certificate of Completion from Launchcode
Certificate in Web Development from St. Louis Community College

I am currently using AWS to create and maintain React + Typescript frontends with C# backends that are a mix of REST and GraphQL.

I'm also familiar with vanilla Node.js + Express + EJS apps. In my spare time I enjoy checking out other frameworks (especially Next.js but also want to look into Svelte).

Design

Education:
BFA in Graphic Design from University of Missouri-St. Louis

Experience creating a wide range of print & digital materials using the Adobe Creative Suite. I use Figma to prototype & for mockups.
